item.title: Micah Redding: Christianity and Transhumanism
item.description:
Micah Redding: Christianity and Transhumanism

How to reconcile science and religion, humanity and technology, Christianity and Transhumanism.

item.title: We All Live in the Developing World | Micah Redding | TEDxUCCI
item.description:
We All Live in the Developing World | Micah Redding | TEDxUCCI

We all live in the developing world. We currently talk of the "developed" and the "developing" world, as if the first world nations have reached the end of history, and all they have to do is to wait for the rest of the world to catch up. But this is a disastrous idea.
